title: Community Testimonials
subtitle: Voices from uranium mining affected areas

testimonials.name: Sushila Devi
testimonials.quote: Since mining started, our children fall sick frequently. Water tastes metallic, crops won't grow. We've lost our traditional way of life.

testimonials.name: Mangal Munda
testimonials.quote: They promised development but brought only dust and disease. Our sacred groves are gone, and with them, our connection to ancestors.

testimonials.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.quote: I've documented 300% increase in respiratory diseases and birth defects since mine expansion. The correlation is undeniable.
